Articles.Content: Very nice, downloading now! Any chance we could get toolbar support? (assuming it's not already there?)
Is there an alternate download available for this?
Hmm looks very promising. Just downloaded it now to test with v0.25. Will post back if it works
This does indeed still work as of v0.25. Thanks.

This does indeed still work as of v0.25. Thanks.

Great to hear
I'll try to get back at this soon, just have had other things at mind.
Yeah do that, I have need of this mod if I hope to use this thing as I hope to ^^
I can't figure out how to work this. I set it to center thrust mode and my engines wont start. Am I missing something?

I can't figure out how to work this. I set it to center thrust mode and my engines wont start. Am I missing something?

Are these downward-facing VTOL engines you're trying to control? Are they all by themselves, or are they paired with horizontal thrust engines?

The easiest way to begin is to use just VTOL engines to start, and assign the direction as Up or Down. There's a button for doing just that.

I can't figure out how to work this. I set it to center thrust mode and my engines wont start. Am I missing something?

Like Voculus alluded to above, engines completely not starting can be caused by not setting the direction of the center thrust mode correctly.

Updated (version 071):

-made an official 0.25 version, no functional changes.

-tested most functionality for .25 with no issues found.
Thanks PrivateFlip!

Updated (version 072):

-added an icon to the stock toolbar

Thanks.... Will update .

cheers

Useful mod. Thanks!

Are you aware of CKAN? Can I suggest you add your mods to it?

See here for easy instructions: https://github.com/KSP-CKAN/CKAN/wiki/Adding-a-mod-to-the-CKAN#30-seconds-guide-for-kerbalstuff

I'm gonna try it anyway , but did anybody used it on 0.90 yet ?

Maybe it's a really dumb question... I can't figure out if the update was before or after 0.90 ... anyway it would have been updated in the title right ?

Updated (version 073):

-0.90 version

-additional throttle positions persist over saves

By chance found out two days ago 0.90 had been released. I was unaware it was even underway when I made the 0.72 update last weekend, so I missed the whole hype train, which isn't so bad.

During testing I discovered the throttle position was not retained when reloading a save. Nobody ever complained about it but it seems undesirable so I added the functionality. No other changes made.

Useful mod. Thanks!

Are you aware of CKAN? Can I suggest you add your mods to it?

See here for easy instructions: https://github.com/KSP-CKAN/CKAN/wiki/Adding-a-mod-to-the-CKAN#30-seconds-guide-for-kerbalstuff

An attempt to add it is currently underway.

Also, module manager support would be great. just have it default to normal engine control.

I can't find the part. It does not exist in control, and I can't find it in the tech tree.

Also, module manager support would be great. just have it default to normal engine control.
